targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*) AS total_runs
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  );

SELECT
  count(distinct session_id) AS total_runs
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  );

SELECT
  sum(cost_usd) AS total_cost
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  );

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'ok' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS success,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'error' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS error,
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'ok' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0),
    2
  ) AS "success rate"
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  );

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS runs,
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS likes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = -1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dislikes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS neutral,
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
    / NULLIF(
        SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback IN (1, -1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
        0
      ),
    2
  ) AS "like rate"
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  );

SELECT
  COALESCE(SUM(prompt_tokens), 0)     AS prompt,
  COALESCE(SUM(completion_tokens), 0) AS completion,
  COALESCE(SUM(reasoning_tokens), 0)  AS reasoning,
  COALESCE(SUM(total_tokens), 0)      AS total
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  );

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'ok' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Success",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status <> 'ok' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Error"
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  COALESCE(SUM(prompt_tokens), 0)     AS prompt,
  COALESCE(SUM(completion_tokens), 0) AS completion,
  COALESCE(SUM(reasoning_tokens), 0)  AS reasoning,
  COALESCE(SUM(total_tokens), 0)      AS total
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  count(distinct session_id)
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  SUM(cost_usd) AS "Cost USD"
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  model_id,
  COUNT(*) AS runs
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY
  model_id
ORDER BY
  runs DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  model_id,
  COALESCE(sum(total_tokens), 0) AS "total tokens"
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY
  model_id
ORDER BY
  2 DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  model_id,
  COUNT(*)                                  AS runs,
  COALESCE(SUM(total_tokens), 0)            AS total_tokens,
  COALESCE(SUM(cost_usd), 0)                AS total_cost_usd
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY
  model_id
ORDER BY
  total_cost_usd DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  model_id,
  COUNT(*) AS total_runs,
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 1  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS likes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = -1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dislikes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 0  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS neutral,
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
    / NULLIF(
        SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback IN (1, -1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
        0
      ),
    2
  ) AS like_rate_pct,
  -- optional: net score = likes - dislikes
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
  - SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = -1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS net_score
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY
  model_id
ORDER BY
  like_rate_pct DESC,
  total_runs DESC;

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 1  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS likes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = -1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dislikes,
  coalesce(ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
    / NULLIF(
        SUM(CASE WHEN user_feedback IN (1, -1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
        0
      ),
    2
  ), 0) AS "like rate"
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

WITH filtered_runs AS (
  SELECT tool_call
  FROM app.runs
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
    AND provider_key IN (${provider})
    AND model_id IN (${model})
    AND (
      CASE
        WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
        ELSE 'Non-streaming'
      END
      IN (${endpoint})
    )
    AND tool_call IS NOT NULL
),
tool_rows AS (
  -- case 1: tool_call is a JSON array, e.g. ["get_custom_movie_details"]
  SELECT
    jsonb_array_elements_text(tool_call) AS tool_name
  FROM filtered_runs
  WHERE jsonb_typeof(tool_call) = 'array'

  UNION ALL

  -- case 2: tool_call is a JSON object, e.g. {"get_custom_movie_details": {...}}
  SELECT
    jsonb_object_keys(tool_call) AS tool_name
  FROM filtered_runs
  WHERE jsonb_typeof(tool_call) = 'object'
)
SELECT
  tool_name,
  COUNT(*) AS runs_with_tool
FROM tool_rows
GROUP BY
  tool_name
ORDER BY
  runs_with_tool DESC;

SELECT
  model_id,
  COUNT(*) AS runs,

  -- Latency
  ROUND(AVG(latency_ms), 2) AS avg_latency_ms,
  ROUND(
    PERCENTILE_DISC(0.9) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY latency_ms),
    2
  ) AS p90_latency_ms,

  -- Time to first token (mostly meaningful for streaming models)
  ROUND(AVG(ttft_ms), 2) AS avg_ttft_ms,

  -- Throughput & size
  ROUND(AVG(total_tokens), 2) AS avg_tokens_per_run,
  ROUND(AVG(tokens_per_second), 2) AS avg_tps

FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
  -- Optional: only consider rows where we actually have latency
  AND latency_ms IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  model_id
ORDER BY
  avg_latency_ms ASC;   -- or runs DESC, or avg_tps DESC, depending on what you prefer

WITH bucketed AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN latency_ms IS NULL THEN 'unknown'
      WHEN latency_ms < 500          THEN '< 500ms'
      WHEN latency_ms < 1000         THEN '500999ms'
      WHEN latency_ms < 2000         THEN '11.9s'
      WHEN latency_ms < 5000         THEN '24.9s'
      ELSE                             '>= 5s'
    END AS latency_bucket,
    CASE
      WHEN latency_ms IS NULL THEN 99
      WHEN latency_ms < 500          THEN 1
      WHEN latency_ms < 1000         THEN 2
      WHEN latency_ms < 2000         THEN 3
      WHEN latency_ms < 5000         THEN 4
      ELSE                             5
    END AS bucket_order
  FROM app.runs
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
    AND provider_key IN (${provider})
    AND model_id IN (${model})
    AND (
      CASE
        WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
        ELSE 'Non-streaming'
      END
      IN (${endpoint})
    )
    AND latency_ms IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  latency_bucket,
  COUNT(*) AS runs
FROM bucketed
GROUP BY
  latency_bucket,
  bucket_order
ORDER BY
  bucket_order;

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  AVG(latency_ms) AS avg_latency_ms
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
  AND latency_ms IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  AVG(ttft_ms) AS avg_ttft_ms
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
  AND ttft_ms IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  AVG(tokens_per_second) AS avg_ttft_ms
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
  AND tokens_per_second IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('${bucket}', occurred_at) AS time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status <> 'ok' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS error_runs,
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN status <> 'ok' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
    / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0),
    2
  ) AS error_rate_pct
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  COALESCE(error_type, 'UNKNOWN') AS error_type,
  COUNT(*) AS error_count
FROM app.runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
  AND provider_key IN (${provider})
  AND model_id IN (${model})
  AND (
    CASE
      WHEN is_stream THEN 'Streaming'
      ELSE 'Non-streaming'
    END
    IN (${endpoint})
  )
  AND status <> 'ok'
GROUP BY
  COALESCE(error_type, 'UNKNOWN')
ORDER BY
  error_count DESC;

list.label: Provider
list.name: provider

list.definition:
SELECT 'Streaming' AS label
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Non-streaming' AS label
ORDER BY label
list.description: Streaming options (derived from ttft. streaming or non-streaming)
list.label: Endpoint
list.name: endpoint
list.query:
SELECT 'Streaming' AS label
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Non-streaming' AS label
ORDER BY label
